_sText:
INFO
--------------------------------------------------------------
The [C]RIPPIN [V]irus (CV) (From the movie, I Am Legend) has been spreading all the way from New York to this little island, the military base is on a small island next to your island. Their airplane (The Harrier) is waiting for the last survivors to get off the infected island so they can bomb it.


CREDITS
--------------------------------------------------------------
barrack by: Hamster
warfactory by: Hamster
